card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NIf this card is Synchro Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 "Speedroid" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.$N●If all materials that were used for the Synchro Summon of this card were "Speedroid" monsters, and are all in your GY, Special Summon all of them.$NYou cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate this effect, except WIND monsters. You can only use this effect of "Hi-Speedroid Cork Shooter" once per turn.
